especificaciones.textoSubencabezado: Development of digital media and brand language with a creative process.Thinking from what your client want’s.

subTextos.branding: logos, lbrand language, colors, graphic pieces.
subTextos.paginasWeb: landing page, e-commerce, robust web pages (programming), UI/UX. Creative Processes: design thinking
subTextos.procesosCreativos: design thinking and custom creative processes for each brand/idea.
subTextos.analisisDeClientes: design process to understand what your potential client want now and in the future.

subTextos.1: of big companies know that user experience will be their competitive advantage.
subTextos.2: of big companies know that a good design leads to more sales and more afnity with their clients.
subTextos.3: of the big companies plan to increase their design staff in the next 12 months.
subTextos.4: Source - KPCB Design in Tech Report, NEA Future of Design Report.

creador.disenadorWeb3: Creative strategist, design thinking expert, UX/UI designer
creador.habilidadesContent: Profesional high quality web designer. User interface and experience development made from the needs of your final client.
creador.contactosContent: I have strategic high quality allies and reliable teams for advanced programming, app development, video production and other formats. All at special prices!
creador.illustrator2: Illustrations, logos, vectors, UI, printed design.
creador.effects2: Video FX, animated logos, motion graphics.
creador.thinking2: Creative process to innovate: user centered design.
creador.esMarca: Is my personal brand; my portfolio.

iniciarProyecto.infoContacto: Send me a message and lets turn that idea into a powerful reality.I check carefully all the delivered message. If you are outside Colombia, dont worry! write me an E-Mail.

proceso.pongamonosContacto: Lets get in touch and tell me about that great idea.
proceso.reunionCreativa1: Each project is unique, thats why we need to have a quick virtual meeting (videocall) to fully understand and define
proceso.reunionCreativa2: what’s your value proposition, who’s your target, your budget and the deliverables we have to make.
proceso.reunionCreativa4: Once we understand the project, you’ll recieve a quotation with the list of deliverables, final price and date of delivery.
proceso.analisisDeCliente1: The most important thing in good design is understanding who are you designing to, this is why we have a unique and custom made process to define and categorize that person who’ll be paying for your product/service.
proceso.disenoYDesarrollo2: According to your potential client’s profiles: we’ll develop a visual and conceptual language according to his/her attributes, in a way that it transmits the identity and value proposition of your brand.
proceso.disenoYDesarrollo4: We’ll unite design with programming to achieve what you want your potential client to do in the web page (or any other digital channel): buy, fill a form, give contact information, etc. using the language and identity of your brand.
